title: Electoral Bonds
text: Website analysing the Electoral Bond data released by the State Bank of India. It includes extensive functionality to retrieve data with a wide range of filters and includes functionality to display the data graphically with the option of exporting said graphs too. Tech Stack used: Flask, HTML, BootstrapCSS, JS, MySQL, chartJS, djinja2

title: Image processing
text: Implemented the algorithms for Histogram Matching and Otsu's Binarization from scratch for transformation of Images. Done as a part of the course : Probability, Statistics and Data Visualization.
